description.value:
When the skeleton takes physical damage from a critical hit, one of its bones is pulverized into a fine powder.

All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] that breathe take [[/r {1d6}[persistent,poison]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Poison Damage} (plus an additional 1d6 for every 6 levels the skeleton has).
